ProjectTitle: Actuaries and STatisticians endeavour to design innovative, inclusive insurance products in a changing RISK landscape
InitialFeedbackHistory:
01/08/2022
For data sharing, you could also use KU Leuven RDR (research data repository), instead of GitHub: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr

19/07/2022
The data management plan for your project needs to be written using the FWO template, and asks for more topics than those you have addressed so far in the preliminary plan. You can use the DMPonline KULeuven tool, or a Word template. Info and template here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp 
Noted that your researchers are not yet in place. So resubmit the DMP when that is the case.
label: good with suggestions
